mapper.sql: ADDRESS_ID, RECV_NAME, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, MP, TEL, ZIP, ADDRESS_TXT, RESIDENTIAL_AREA, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT, VIP_CUST_NO,IS_DEFAULT,STREET
mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS_ID, RECV_NAME, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.PROVINCE ) PROVINCE_NAME, d.PROVINCE, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.CITY ) CITY_NAME,d.CITY, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.COUNTY ) COUNTY_NAME,d.COUNTY, d.STREET, MP, TEL, ZIP, ADDRESS_TXT, ( SELECT a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT FROM t_md_residential_area a WHERE a.ID = d.RESIDENTIAL_AREA ) RESIDENTIAL_AREA_NAME,d.RESIDENTIAL_AREA, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT, VIP_CUST_NO, IS_DEFAULT, IS_DELETE from t_md_address d where ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_md_address
ADDRESS_ID,
RECV_NAME,
PROVINCE,
CITY,
COUNTY,
MP,
TEL,
ZIP,
ADDRESS_TXT,
RESIDENTIAL_AREA,
CREATE_AT,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_BY_TXT,
LAST_MODIFIED,
LAST_MODIFIED_BY,
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,
VIP_CUST_NO,
STREET,
IS_DEFAULT,

mapper.update:
update t_md_address
RECV_NAME = #{recvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MP = #{mp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_TXT = #{addressTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESIDENTIAL_AREA = #{residentialArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIP_CUST_NO = #{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STREET = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT=#{isDafault,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS_ID, RECV_NAME, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.PROVINCE ) PROVINCE_NAME, d.PROVINCE, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.CITY ) CITY_NAME,d.CITY, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.COUNTY ) COUNTY_NAME,d.COUNTY, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.STREET ) STREET_NAME,d.STREET, MP, TEL, ZIP, ADDRESS_TXT, ( SELECT a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT FROM t_md_residential_area a WHERE a.ID = d.RESIDENTIAL_AREA ) RESIDENTIAL_AREA_NAME,d.RESIDENTIAL_AREA, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT, VIP_CUST_NO, IS_DEFAULT FROM t_md_address d WHERE d.IS_DELETE='N' AND d.VIP_CUST_NO = #{custNo} order by IS_DEFAULT desc,LAST_MODIFIED desc,CREATE_AT desc
SELECT FROM t_md_address WHERE VIP_CUST_NO=#{custNo} and IS_DELETE='N' order by IS_DEFAULT desc,LAST_MODIFIED desc,CREATE_AT desc

SELECT ADDRESS_ID, RECV_NAME, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.PROVINCE ) PROVINCE, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.CITY ) CITY, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.COUNTY ) COUNTY, ( SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = d.STREET ) STREET, MP, TEL, ZIP, ADDRESS_TXT, ( SELECT a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT FROM t_md_residential_area a WHERE a.ID = d.RESIDENTIAL_AREA ) RESIDENTIAL_AREA, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT, VIP_CUST_NO, IS_DEFAULT FROM t_md_address d WHERE IS_DELETE='N' and ADDRESS_ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
update t_md_address
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT='N',
WHERE IS_DELETE='N' AND ADDRESS_ID <> #{addressId} AND VIP_CUST_NO=#{vipCustNo}
mapper.select: SELECT t.ADDRESS_ID, t.PROVINCE, t.COUNTY, t.CITY, t.ADDRESS_TXT FROM t_md_address t WHERE t.VIP_CUST_NO = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.IS_DEFAULT = 'Y'

SELECT CONCAT( IFNULL( ( SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item WHERE TYPE_CODE = '1001' AND ITEM_CODE = #{province} ), '' ), IFNULL( ( SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item WHERE TYPE_CODE = '1001' AND ITEM_CODE = #{city} ), '' ), IFNULL( ( SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item WHERE TYPE_CODE = '1001' AND ITEM_CODE = #{county} ), '' ), IFNULL( ( SELECT a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT FROM t_md_residential_area a WHERE a.ID = #{residentialArea} ), '' ), IFNULL( ( SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL(a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT,''),IFNULL(a.ADDRESS_TXT,'')) FROM t_md_residential_area a WHERE a.ID = #{residentialArea} ), '' ) ) ADDRESS_TXT FROM DUAL
